protein.general_function: Involved in oxidoreductase activity, acting on NADH or
protein.specific_function: Adapter protein of the Toll-like and IL-1 receptor signaling pathway that is involved in the activation of NF-kappa-B via MAP3K1. Promotes proteolytic activation of MAP3K1. Involved in the BMP signaling pathway. Required for normal embryonic development. Required for efficient assembly of mitochondrial NADH:ubiquinone oxidoreductase
